Traveling in a group and being led by a tour guide has both advantages and disadvantages and the consideration about whether it is a best way of traveling or not depends on many factors .

 Suppose you are a busy working man and you want to spend your vacation or annual leave .
 You have a week or two and you plan to go somewhere .
 First of all , most people wants comfort in such cases and they would want go to the major sightseeings .
 In cases such, organized tour by a led guide is the best option: tourist the company everything will arrange you for all you - have to do is. enjoy
 The will guide tell you most what travelers would like to know and you do n ' t have a refer to to book out find about sightseeing you the ' re at.
 You are of all free the uncertainties and risks involved in traveling and alone responsible being yourself. for

 But traveling in group a by a led tour guide has several restrictions and they are even frustrating if are you adventures seeking or totally personal experiences.
 Felt I personally it I when went a to turkic tombstone in rural Mongolia with a group of tourists.
 The tombstone was awsome at least for me for I was interested in Turkic history .
 Had inscription it on it I and was badly wanting to try to read it on my own I once (spent trying some time to the learn letters old ).
 But the group had only 2 hours to spend there and I had to leave the tombstone with them too because other members of the group did not share the same interest and the schedule said that we should be at the tourist camp by 4 o'clock .
 Felt I frustrated so that I decided then that will I go there sometime alone afterwards.
 So this example of mine illustrates the bad point of guided travel - you 're not free to decide where to go or where to stay for how long .
 You ca n't actually , if I can put it this way , `` taste '' the activity and the place because the experience is not all yours : it rather turns out to be a group experience and it does not give you that feeling when you find do something , think about something out , experience something on your own without being distracted .

 Personally , therefore , I prefer to travel alone if I have enough time but at the same time , I agree that organized travel can be useful and enjoyable experience if you does not have enough time or if you are not really into the destination of your travel .

 Contary to this approcah , some people say that this is the world of specialization and it is very important to be a master in one subject to be successful in life .

 For say a example marketing of manager Fast a Moving Consumer Goods deicdes company to launch a promotional for campaign product a.
 The about knowledge the issues related financial the to can campaign be really helpful the in decision making.

 Knowledge about other subjects such as finance , strategy and human behaviour can help the manager in making better informed decisions .
 This example clearly shows the importance of having broad knowledge of many academic subjects .

 On the other hand , there is no denial to the fact that this is a highly competitive world .

Different ways of learning can be taught by a professor or lecturer in order to make it easier for their students to memorize certain study matters .
 Believe, some trying that to help their understand students to concepts ideas and is more important than just learning facts.

 To begin with , encouraging students to develop their own ideas and concepts about a certain topic and in the end to draw a conclusion , is very likely to have a positive aspect on the student 's memory .
 For example, if a in student history a the task class has to think about the the way Geman people must have felt at the of end the Second World War, and s / works he out feelings their of desperation and hopelessness, s / he has learned through experience.

 Moreover, through having understood certain ideas and concepts, a student can basically transfer them to nowadays and situations well to as subject another theme or.
 For instance, learned having concept the of behaviour social on a specific example and having understood the idea of it, the student will be able easily to observe the social behaviour, its and causes consequences, his in / her own environment to and them compare to other unsocial behaviour and way the it in differs every country and continent.

 Learning facts surely has its disadvantages in specific exam situations .
 For example , if a student is beeing asked about when certain historical events took place .
 Especially in the subject of history, learning dates by heart rather is important mostly, in to order getting avoid mixed with up situations happened that before another event and to recieve a basic overview of certain periods of time.

 All things considered , there are more benefits for students , not only in school but for the entire life , to beeing able to use learned ideas and concepts in a variety of fields than to learn facts that can be easily forgotten just after the exam has finished .
